Container.Name: wallabag
Container.Description: [h3]wallabag[/h3]wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. With this application you will not miss content anymore. Click, save, read it when you want. It saves the content you select so that you can read it when you have time.[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/var/www/wallabag/db[/b] : this path is where wallabag will store it\'s database file which contains data for users, articles, and configuration.[br] Initial username and password are [b]wallabag[/b]
